biotools.summary: These functions calculate the pair of genes that show the maximum difference in ranking between two user specified groups. This "top scoring pair" maximizes the average of sensitivity and specificity over all rank based classifiers using a pair of genes in the data set. The advantage of this method is that the classifiers are much simpler and often easily interpretable and if arrays can be classified using only a pair of genes, PCR based tests could be used for classification of samples.

bioschemas.name: tspair
